values: A brave person is not afraid to face pain or danger.
The brave firefighter saved the girl from the burning building.
vt. 勇敢面对；不怕；不顾比较级:braver，bravest副 词:bravely

Brave means showing courage or fearlessness in the face of danger or difficulty.
